attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The incapacity Benifit system is flawed,the 1967 law that was amended in 1997 in respect that if your benifit was stopped after seeing a benifits doctor you have got no right of appeal you can but it makes no differance at all because only the benifits doctors opinion is taken into account this cannot be right that no matter how much evidence you give from your own medical doctors you have got no rights ai all this is very wrong and its happening to some very sick people this needs action now it may happen to you who else has NO RIGHTS AT ALL please help this petition
